name: biomni-align-sequences
title: Biomni: Align Sequences
description: Align short sequences (primers) to a longer target sequence allowing for one mismatch
content:
Overview

This tool aligns short DNA sequences (such as primers) to a longer target sequence, allowing for up to one mismatch. It uses sequence alignment algorithms to find the best binding sites of short oligonucleotides on a template DNA sequence, which is essential for primer design validation and PCR optimization.

Input Parameters

  • long_seq: Target DNA sequence (template) to search for alignment sites
  • short_seqs: One or more short DNA sequences (primers/oligonucleotides) to align against the target

Biological Use Case

Used in molecular cloning and PCR applications to:

  • Validate primer binding sites on plasmid vectors
  • Check for off-target primer binding locations
  • Verify oligonucleotide specificity before ordering
  • Analyze probe hybridization sites for molecular diagnostics
  • Quality control for primer design in mutagenesis experiments

Output

Returns a parameters (alignment_results.json) containing alignment positions, match quality scores, and any mismatches identified for each short sequence aligned to the target.

Category

molecular_biology
